title: Rainy city street driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a rainy city street, passing a red truck on the right and a bus on the left.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several parked cars on the side of the street. The traffic is light, with only a few cars driving in the opposite direction. The ego vehicle is driving in the right lane and is maintaining a moderate speed. There are several traffic lights and street signs visible along the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving carefully in the rain, maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles on the road. It passes a red truck on the right and a bus on the left, both of which are also driving at a moderate speed. The ego vehicle is following the traffic rules and is paying close attention to the road conditions to ensure a safe journey.
